definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Well, the speedometer is worn out.
This paper discusses the static model of a multi-finger micromechanical accelerometer.
sentences.chinese: 討論了一種梳齒式微機械加速度計的靜態模型。

sentences.english: Test the accelerometers which is fixed in three-axis rotary table on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 第三，在地面進行加速度計的三軸轉檯實驗。

sentences.english: A novel non-contact fiber optic accelerometer is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種新型光纖非接觸加速度計。

sentences.english: Another application refers to a wireless headset equipped with an accelerometer.
sentences.chinese: 另一項專利則描述了一種裝有加速度計的無線耳機。

sentences.english: The instrument that measures the speed is a speedometer.
sentences.chinese: 用來測定速度的儀器是速度計。

sentences.english: Quartz resonator is a key part of the quartz vibrating beam accelerometer.
sentences.chinese: 石英諧振器是石英振梁式加速度計的關鍵部件。

sentences.english: Potting is a key step for the packaging of high-g micro-electro-mechanical system(MEMS) accelerometer.
sentences.chinese: 灌封是高量程微機械加速度計實用化的一個關鍵步驟。

sentences.english: "Don't you ever look at the speedometer?" the officer scolded.
sentences.chinese: “你有沒有看一下速度計？”警官冷冷的問。

sentences.english: Silicon-micro-accelerometer is fabricated by plasma etch technology.
sentences.chinese: 採用等離子體刻蝕技術製作成硅微加速度計。

sentences.english: The piezoelectric acceleration sensor is a kind of common accelerometer.
sentences.chinese: 壓電式加速度變送器是一種常用的加速度計。

sentences.english: Accelerometer is one of the main inertial components in inertial measuring and navigation systems.
sentences.chinese: 加速度計是慣性測量和導航系統的主要慣性元件之一。
